Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: they welcomed us kindly and the pizza is absolutely delicious. you can see and taste that they use fresh ingredients. The prizes are quiet cheap compared to the other locations, especially regarding to the size of the meal, so i really recommend this spot!

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Only giving it 3 stars because the food was good. If you don't care about the service then go there for the food, but if you want a whole lunch/dining experience expecting good service then avoid this place. Went there with friends to ‚Ä¶

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: The whole place is very nice! My wife ordered the tagliatelle ao pesto and I had an amazing pasta with shrimp! It's a good portion and the staff is very nice!

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Lovely time here having some pasta and some wine in the mid afternoon. This place was great, really nice outdoor courtyard dining and seating options. The food was delicious, handmade noodles and very fresh ingrediants.

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Pasta is good, salad is good too, price is reasonable!

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Fine good Italian pasta in a very fare price

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Just had a meal there after a long day walking around Amsterdam. The four of us had a delightful selection of pizzas while sat in their Garden at the back. Staff and service both good. Would happily eat there again to try out other dishes from the menu.

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Appalling attitude from the manager/waiter. Rude, rushing every customer and being utterly disrespectful. On top of that, he got the first part of the order wrong. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: As our 1st choice restaurant was full but we saw the sign outside that they also serve vegan food. so we tried and were positively surprised how friendly the waiter was. But the impression changed as more people entered the restaurant.. I ‚Ä¶

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Simply amazing pizza - try it!

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Rude unnacomodating owner and staff. Various wrong orders. Knives and forks short and waited 15mins for another to be brought over. I'm sure this was on purpose. Owner didnt seem to want to be there or for us to be there either. Expensive for the average food we recieved.  Disappointing.

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: The food in here was very tasty however the service not so much from the gentleman who worked there but if you love pasta then it's worth it

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: To my experience this is the best place to have some delicious Italian food in Amsterdam. It is affordable, the quality of the food is great and everything tasted FRESH, and the dishes ordered came straight out of the oven, no reheating bs ‚Ä¶

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Great food,nice place and fair prices!

Name: Pasta Factory

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: My daughter and I really enjoyed our dinner. We've had homemade pasta and pizza. Good service and food. Try it out :)

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: Not really traditional Italian pasta, so the price is a bit high for what you get. Americanized pasta with creamy sauces. Good beers and nice restaurant though.

Name: Pasta Factory
Review Text: The best mustard honey dip ever!

Name: Pasta Factory

Name: Pasta Factory
